movie.title: A Christmas Mystery
movie.description_intro: When a reporter discovers that her late mother had been receiving Christmas cards from a secret admirer, she decides to track him down. In the process, she'll discover a family secret more dangerous than she could have ever imagined.
movie.description_full: When a reporter discovers that her late mother had been receiving Christmas cards from a secret admirer, she decides to track him down. In the process, she'll discover a family secret more dangerous than she could have ever imagined.

movies.title: Love Is the Devil: Study for a Portrait of Francis Bacon
movies.title_english: Love Is the Devil: Study for a Portrait of Francis Bacon
movies.title_long: Love Is the Devil: Study for a Portrait of Francis Bacon (1998)
movies.summary: In the 1960s, British painter Francis Bacon (1909-1992) surprises a burglar and invites him to share his bed. The burglar, a working class man named George Dyer, thirty years younger than Bacon, accepts. Bacon finds Dyer's amorality and innocence attractive, introducing him to his Soho pals. In their sex life, Dyer dominates, Bacon is the masochist. Dyer's bouts with depression, his drinking, pill popping, and his Satanic nightmares strain the relationship, as does his pain with Bacon's casual infidelities. Bacon paints, talks with wit, and, as Dyer spins out of control, begins to find him tiresome. Could Bacon care less?

Bacon paints, talks with wit, and, as Dyer spins out of control, begins to find him tiresome. Could Bacon care less?

movies.title: Cherry Blossoms
movies.summary: When Trudi learns that her husband Rudi is dangerously ill, she suggests visiting their children in Berlin without telling him the truth. As Franzi and Karl don't care much about their parents, Trudi and Rudi go to the Baltic Sea, where Trudi suddenly dies. Rudi is thrown out of gear, even more when he learns that his wife wanted to live a totally different life in Japan...

movies.title: Demonia Undertaker
movies.summary: Alien bounty hunters from another planet are sent to stop Tanash, a possessed demonic serial killer who comes to earth to take over the bodies of humans before killing them. Staleth, played by Geovanni Molina and Colinus, played by Jay D Lee, are sent to stop him as Earth's only hope.

movies.title: Limbo
movies.summary: A murderer finds himself on trial in Hell, caught between a bitter prosecutor and an inexperienced defense attorney.
movies.description_full: A murderer finds himself on trial in Hell, caught between a bitter prosecutor and an inexperienced defense attorney.
